  </div>\n  </div>\n  <div class="jumbotron">\n   <div class="container">\n    <h1 class="pacifico" itemprop="name">\n     Angular Selector\n    </h1>\n    <p class="lead">\n     Angular Selector is a native AngularJS directive that transform a simple\n     <code>\n      &lt;select&gt;\n     </code>\n     box into a full html select with typeahead.\n    </p>\n    <ul class="list-inline">\n remove-button has-value" dir="ltr" multi="true" ng-attr-dir="{{rtl ? \'rtl\' : \'ltr\'}}" ng-class="{open: isOpen, empty: !filteredOptions.length &amp;&amp; (!create || !search), multiple: multiple, \'has-value\': hasValue(), rtl: rtl, loading: loading, \'remove-button\': removeButton, disabled: disabled}" selector="">\n      <select class="ng-pristine ng-untouched ng-valid ng-hide ng-valid-required" multiple="" name="" ng-hide="true" ng-model="selectedValues" ng-options="option as getObjValue(option, labelAttr) for option in selectedValues" ng-required="required &amp;&amp; !hasValue()">\n       <option label="Angular" value="object:8">\n        Angular\n       </option>\n       <option label="Selector" value="object:9">\n        Selector\n       </option>\n      </select>\n      <label class="selector-input">\n       <ul class="selector-values">\n        <!-- ngRepeat: (index, option) in selectedValues track by index -->\n        <li class="ng-scope" ng-repeat="(index, option) in selectedValues track by index">\n         <!-- ngInclude: viewItemTemplate -->\n         <div class="ng-scope" ng-include="viewItemTemplate">\n          <span class="ng-binding ng-scope" ng-bind="getObjValue(option, labelAttr) || option">\n           Angular\n          </span>\n         </div>\n         <!-- ngIf: multiple -->\n         <div class="selector-helper ng-scope" ng-click="!disabled &amp;&amp; unset(index)" ng-if="multiple">\n          <span class="selector-icon">\n          </span>\n         </div>\n         <!-- end ngIf: multiple -->\n        </li>\n        <!-- end ngRepeat: (index, option) in selectedValues track by index -->\n        <li class="ng-scope" ng-repeat="(index, option) in selectedValues track by index">\n         <!-- ngInclude: viewItemTemplate -->\n         <div class="ng-scope" ng-include="viewItemTemplate">\n          <span class="ng-binding ng-scope" ng-bind="getObjValue(option, labelAttr) || option">\n           Selector\n          </span>\n         </div>\n         <!-- ngIf: multiple -->\n         <div class="selector-helper ng-scope" ng-click="!disabled &amp;&amp; unset(index)" ng-if="multiple">\n          <span class="selector-icon">\n          </span>\n         </div>\n         <!-- end ngIf: multiple -->\n        </li>\n        <!-- end ngRepeat: (index, option) in selectedValues track by index -->\n       </ul>\n       <input autocomplete="off" class="ng-pristine ng-untouched ng-valid ng-valid-required" ng-disabled="disabled" ng-model="search" ng-model-options="{debounce: debounce}" ng-readonly="disableSearch" ng-required="required &amp;&amp; !hasValue()" placeholder="" style="width: 1px;"/>\n       <!-- ngIf: !multiple || loading -->\n      </label>\n      <ul class="selector-dropdown" ng-show="filteredOptions.length &gt; 0 || (create &amp;&amp; search)">\n       <!-- ngIf: create && search -->\n       <!-- ngRepeat: (index, option) in filteredOptions track by index -->\n       <!-- ngInclude: dropdownGroupTemplate -->\n       <li class="selector-optgroup ng-scope ng-hide" ng-include="dropdownGroupTemplate" ng-repeat-start="(index, option) in filteredOptions track by index" ng-show="groupAttr &amp;&amp; (getObjValue(option, groupAttr) &amp;&amp; index == 0 || getObjValue(filteredOptions[index - 1], groupAttr) != getObjValue(option, groupAttr))">\n        <span class="ng-binding ng-scope" ng-bind="getObjValue(option, groupAttr)">\n        </span>\n       </li>\n       <!-- ngInclude: dropdownItemTemplate -->\n       <li class="selector-option ng-scope active" ng-class="{active: highlighted == index, grouped: groupAttr &amp;&amp; getObjValue(option, groupAttr)}" ng-click="set()" ng-include="dropdownItemTemplate" ng-mouseover="highlight(index)" ng-repeat-end="">\n        <span class="ng-binding ng-scope" ng-bind="getObjValue(option, labelAttr) || option">\n         No-jQuery required\n        </span>\n       </li>\n       <!-- end ngRepeat: (index, option) in filteredOptions track by index -->\n      </ul>\n     </div>\n    </p>\n   </div>\n  </div>\n  <div class="container">\n   <article class="features">\n    <h2 class="pacifico">\n     Features\n    </h2>\n    <ul>\n     <li>\n      <h4>\n       No-jQuery Required\n      </h4>\n      <p>\n       Angular Selector is a full native Angular directive, so you can use it without have to include any other library (except AngularJS, of course!).\n      </p>\n     </li>\n     <li>\n      <h4>\n       Skinnable\n      </h4>\n      <p>\n       You can define a template for the items in the dropdown list and a template for selected items.\n      </p>\n     </li>\n     <li>\n      <h4>\n       RTL Support\n      </h4>\n      <p>\n       To use it in with any kind of text direction.\n      </p>\n     </li>\n     <li>\n      <h4>\n       Remote Resource Loading\n      </h4>\n      <p>\n       Fetch your data from an external source and use it in your application.\n      </p>\n     </li>\n     <li>\n      <h4>\n       From HTML\n       <code>\n        &lt;option&gt;\n       </code>\n       to JS\n       <code>\n        object\n       </code>\n      </h4>\n      <p>\n       Fill your\n       <code>\n        &lt;select&gt;\n       </code>\n       from server-side ad use data-attributes for every option you have,\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tthen\n       <i>\n        Angular Selector\n       </i>\n       performs for you the conversion to a simple array of objects.\n      </p>\n     </li>\n     <li>\n      <h4>\n       Custom Option Creation\n      </h4>\n      <p>\n       You can create new options and add them to the list, just by hitting\n       <kbd>\n        Enter\n       </kbd>\n       .\n      </p>\n     </li>\n     <li>\n      <h4>\n       Keyboard support\n      </h4>\n      <p>\n       Move up and down the dropdown list using keyboard arrows.\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSelect highlighted item pressing\n       <kbd>\n        Enter\n       </kbd>\n       . Remove last selected item with\n       <kbd>\n        Del\n       </kbd>\n       key.\n      </p>\n     </li>\n     <li>\n      <h4>\n       Responsive\n      </h4>\n      <p>\n       Perfect for use in mobile environments.\n      </p>\n     </li>\n    </ul>\n   </article>\n   <article class="options">\n    <h2 class="pacifico">\n     Options\n    </h2>\n    <p class="lead">\n     Check out all the available options\n     <a href="https://github.com/indrimuska/angular-selector#options" target="_blank">\n      here\n     </a>\n     .\n    </p>\n   </article>\n   <article class="examples">\n    <h2 class="pacifico">\n     Examples\n    </h2>\n    <!-- ngRepeat: example in examples -->\n    <section class="ng-scope" ng-init="tab=\'view\'" ng-repeat="example in examples">\n     <div selector\n\t\t\tmodel="browser"\n\t\t\toptions="browsers"\n\t\t\tvalue-attr="value"&gt;&lt;/select&gt;\n\t\t\n\t\t&lt;p&gt;\n\t\t\tCurrent value: &lt;code ng-bind="browser|json"&gt;&lt;/code&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/p&gt;\n\t\t\n\t\t&lt;script src="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/angularjs/1.4.1/angular.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;\n\t\t&lt;script <input name="files[style.css]" type="hidden" value="body { margin: 30px; }\np { margin-top: 10px; }\ndl { margin-top: 15px; }\n.btn-group { margin-bottom: 15px; }\n.checkbox-inline { font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 10px; }"/>\n         <input name="files[script.js]" type="hidden" value="angular\n\t.module(\'myApp\', [\'selector\'])\n\t.controller(\'ExampleCtrl\', [\'$scope\', function ($scope) {\n\t\t$scope.browser = &quot;GC&quot;;\n\t\t\n\t\t$scope.browsers = [\n\t\t\t{ value: &quot;GC&quot;, label: &quot;Chrome&quot; },\n\t\t\t{ value: &quot;FF&quot;, label: &quot;Firefox&quot;     <h4 class="ng-binding" ng-bind-html="example.title|trustAsHtml">\n       Single element\n      </h4>\n     </div>\n     <!-- ngIf: example.service -->\n     <!-- ngIf: !example.service -->\n has-value remove-button" dir="ltr" model="browser" ng-attr-dir="{{rtl ? \'rtl\' : \'ltr\'}}" ng-class="{open: isOpen, empty: !filteredOptions.length &amp;&amp; (!create || !search), multiple:   </div>\n  </div>\n  <div class="jumbotron">\n   <div class="container">\n    <h1 class="pacifico" itemprop="name">\n     Angular Selector\n    </h1>\n    <p class="lead">\n     Angular Selector is a native AngularJS directive that transform a simple\n     <code>\n      &lt;select&gt;\n     </code>\n     box into a full html select with typeahead.\n    </p>\n    <ul class="list-inline">\n     <li>\n      <iframe allowtransparency="true" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" src="https://buttons.github.io/buttons.html#href=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Findrimuska%2Fangular-selector&amp;text=Star&amp;data-count-api=&amp;data-count-href=&amp;data-count-aria-label=&amp;data-style=mega&amp;data-icon=octicon-star&amp;aria-label=Star%20indrimuska%2Fangular-selector%20on%20GitHub" src="https://buttons.github.io/buttons.html#href=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Findrimuska%2Fangular-selector%2Ffork&amp;text=Fork&amp;data-count-api=&amp;data-count-href=&amp;data-count-aria-label=&amp;data-style=mega&amp;data-icon=octicon-git-branch&amp;aria-label=Fork%20indrimuska%2Fangular-selector%20on%20GitHub" style="width: 62px; height: 28px; border: none;">\n      </iframe>\n     </li>\n     <li>\n      <iframe allowtransparency="true" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" src="https://buttons.github.io/buttons.html#href=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Findrimuska%2Fangular-selector&amp;text=Watch&amp;data-count-api=&amp;data-count-href=&amp;data-count-aria-label=&amp;data-style=mega&amp;data-icon=octicon-eye&amp;aria-label=Watch%20indrimuska%2Fangular-selector%20on%20GitHub" style="width: 100px; height: 28px; border: none;">\n      </iframe>\n     </li>\n    </ul>\n    <p class="lead">\n     <div class="jumbotron-selector selector-container ng-isolate-scope multiple remove-button has-value" dir="ltr" multi="true" ng-attr-dir="{{rtl ? \'rtl\' : \'ltr\'}}" ng-class="{open: isOpen, empty: !filteredOptions.length &amp;&amp; (!create || !search), multiple: multiple, \'has-value\': hasValue(), rtl: rtl, loading: loading, \'remove-button\': removeButton, disabled: disabled}" selector="">\n      <select class="ng-pristine ng-untouched ng-valid ng-hide ng-valid-required" multiple="" name="" ng-hide="true" ng-model="selectedValues" ng-options="option as getObjValue(option, labelAttr) for option in selectedValues" ng-required="required &amp;&amp; !hasValue()">\n       <option label="Angular" value="object:8">\n        Angular\n       </option>\n       <option label="Selector" value="object:9">\n        Selector\n       </option>\n      </select>\n      <label class="selector-input">\n       <ul class="selector-values">\n        <!-- ngRepeat: (index, option) in selectedValues track by index -->\n        <li class="ng-scope" ng-repeat="(index, option) in selectedValues track by index">\n         <!-- ngInclude: viewItemTemplate -->\n         <div class="ng-scope" ng-include="viewItemTemplate">\n          <span class="ng-binding ng-scope" ng-bind="getObjValue(option, labelAttr) || option">\n           Angular\n          </span>\n         </div>\n         <!-- ngIf: multiple -->\n         <div class="selector-helper ng-scope" ng-click="!disabled &amp;&amp; unset(index)" ng-if="multiple">\n          <span class="selector-icon">\n          </span>\n         </div>\n         <!-- end ngIf: multiple -->\n        </li>\n        <!-- end ngRepeat: (index, option) in selectedValues track by index -->\n        <li class="ng-scope" ng-repeat="(index, option) in selectedValues track by index">\n         <!-- ngInclude: viewItemTemplate -->\n         <div class="ng-scope" ng-include="viewItemTemplate">\n          <span class="ng-binding ng-scope" ng-bind="getObjValue(option, labelAttr) || option">\n           Selector\n          </span>\n         </div>\n         <!-- ngIf: multiple -->\n         <div class="selector-helper ng-scope" ng-click="!disabled &amp;&amp; unset(index)" ng-if="multiple">\n          <span class="selector-icon">\n          </span>\n         </div>\n         <!-- end ngIf: multiple -->\n        </li>\n        <!-- end ngRepeat: (index, option) in selectedValues track by index -->\n       </ul>\n       <input autocomplete="off" class="ng-pristine ng-untouched ng-valid ng-valid-required" ng-disabled="disabled" ng-model="search" ng-model-options="{debounce: debounce}" ng-readonly="disableSearch" ng-required="required &amp;&amp; !hasValue()" placeholder="" style="width: 1px;"/>\n       <!-- ngIf: !multiple || loading -->\n      </label>\n      <ul class="selector-dropdown" ng-show="filteredOptions.length &gt; 0 || (create &amp;&amp; search)">\n       <!-- ngIf: create && search -->\n       <!-- ngRepeat: (index, option) in filteredOptions track by index -->\n       <!-- ngInclude: dropdownGroupTemplate -->\n       <li class="selector-optgroup ng-scope ng-hide" ng-include="dropdownGroupTemplate" ng-repeat-start="(index, option) in filteredOptions track by index" ng-show="groupAttr &amp;&amp; (getObjValue(option, groupAttr) &amp;&amp; index == 0 || getObjValue(filteredOptions[index - 1], groupAttr) != getObjValue(option, groupAttr))">\n        <span class="ng-binding ng-scope" ng-bind="getObjValue(option, groupAttr)">\n        </span>\n       </li>\n       <!-- ngInclude: dropdownItemTemplate -->\n       <li class="selector-option ng-scope active" ng-class="{active: highlighted == index, grouped: groupAttr &amp;&amp; getObjValue(option, groupAttr)}" ng-click="set()" ng-include="dropdownItemTemplate" ng-mouseover="highlight(index)" ng-repeat-end="">\n        <span class="ng-binding ng-scope" ng-bind="getObjValue(option, labelAttr) || option">\n         No-jQuery required\n        </span>\n       </li>\n       <!-- end ngRepeat: (index, option) in filteredOptions track by index -->\n      </ul>\n     </div>\n    </p>\n   </div>\n  </div>\n  <div class="container">\n   <article class="features">\n    <h2 class="pacifico">\n     Features\n    </h2>\n    <ul>\n     <li>\n      <h4>\n       No-jQuery Required\n      </h4>\n      <p>\n       Angular Selector is a full native Angular directive, so you can use it without have to include any other library (except AngularJS, of course!).\n      </p>\n     </li>\n     <li>\n      <h4>\n       Skinnable\n      </h4>\n      <p>\n       You can define a template for the items in the dropdown list and a template for selected items.\n      </p>\n     </li>\n     <li>\n      <h4>\n       RTL Support\n      </h4>\n      <p>\n       To use it in with any kind of text direction.\n      </p>\n     </li>\n     <li>\n      <h4>\n       Remote Resource Loading\n      </h4>\n      <p>\n       Fetch your data from an external source and use it in your application.\n      </p>\n     </li>\n     <li>\n      <h4>\n       From HTML\n       <code>\n        &lt;option&gt;\n       </code>\n       to JS\n       <code>\n        object\n       </code>\n      </h4>\n      <p>\n       Fill your\n       <code>\n        &lt;select&gt;\n       </code>\n       from server-side ad use data-attributes for every option you have,\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tthen\n       <i>\n        Angular Selector\n       </i>\n       performs for you the conversion to a simple array of objects.\n      </p>\n     </li>\n     <li>\n      <h4>\n       Custom Option Creation\n      </h4>\n      <p>\n       You can create new options and add them to the list, just by hitting\n       <kbd>\n        Enter\n       </kbd>\n       .\n      </p>\n     </li>\n     <li>\n      <h4>\n       Keyboard support\n      </h4>\n      <p>\n       Move up and down the dropdown list using keyboard arrows.\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSelect highlighted item pressing\n       <kbd>\n        Enter\n       </kbd>\n       . Remove last selected item with\n       <kbd>\n        Del\n       </kbd>\n       key.\n      </p>\n     </li>\n     <li>\n      <h4>\n       Responsive\n      </h4>\n      <p>\n       Perfect for use in mobile environments.\n      </p>\n     </li>\n    </ul>\n   </article>\n   <article class="options">\n    <h2 class="pacifico">\n     Options\n    </h2>\n    <p class="lead">\n     Check out all the available options\n     <a href="https://github.com/indrimuska/angular-selector#options" target="_blank">\n      here\n     </a>\n     .\n    </p>\n   </article>\n   <article class="examples">\n    <h2 class="pacifico">\n     Examples\n    </h2>\n    <!-- ngRepeat: example in examples -->\n    <section class="ng-scope" ng-init="tab=\'view\'" ng-repeat="example in examples">\n     <div class="navbar">\n      <ul class="nav nav-pills navbar-right">\n       <li class="active" ng-class="{active:tab==\'view\'}" ng-show="!example.service">\n        <a ng-click="tab=\'view\'">\n         View\n        </a>\n       </li>\n       <li ng-class="{active:tab==\'html\'}" ng-show="!example.service">\n        <a ng-click="tab=\'html\'">\n         HTML\n        </a>\n       </li>\n       <li ng-class="{active:tab==\'js\'}" ng-show="!example.service &amp;&amp; example.js">\n        <a ng-click="tab=\'js\'">\n         JS\n        </a>\n       </li>\n       <li plunker="">\n        <form name="files[index.html]" type="hidden" value=\'&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;\n&lt;html ng-app="myApp" ng-controller="ExampleCtrl as ctrl"&gt;\n\t&lt;head&gt;\n\t\t&lt;meta charset="utf-8"&gt;\n\t\t&lt;meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge"&gt;\n\t\t&lt;meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"&gt;\n\t\t&lt;link rel="stylesheet" href="//maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.5/css/bootstrap.min.css"&gt;\n\t\t&lt;link rel="stylesheet" class="page-header"&gt;Single element&lt;/h1&gt;\n\t\t\n\t\t&lt;select selector\n\t\t\tmodel="browser"\n\t\t\toptions="browsers"\n\t\t\tvalue-attr="value"&gt;&lt;/select&gt;\n\t\t\n\t\t&lt;p&gt;\n\t\t\tCurrent value: &lt;code ng-bind="browser|json"&gt;&lt;/code&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/p&gt;\n\t\t\n\t\t&lt;script src="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/angularjs/1.4.1/angular.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;\n\t\t&lt;script src="//cdn.rawgit.com/indrimuska/angular-selector/master/dist/angular-selector.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;\n\t\t&lt;script src="script.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;\n\t&lt;/body&gt;\n&lt;/html&gt;\'/>\n         <input name="files[style.css]" type="hidden" value="body { margin: 30px; }\np { margin-top: 10px; }\ndl { margin-top: 15px; }\n.btn-group { margin-bottom: 15px; }\n.checkbox-inline { font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 10px; }"/>\n         <input name="files[script.js]" type="hidden" value="angular\n\t.module(\'myApp\', [\'selector\'])\n\t.controller(\'ExampleCtrl\', [\'$scope\', function },\n\t\t\t{ value: 1, label: &quot;Videogames&quot; },\n\t\t\t{ value: 2, label: &quot;Travelling&quot; }\n\t\t];\n\t\t\n\t\t$scope.creation = {\n\t\t\tactive: false,\n\t\t\tdeferred: null,\n\t\t\tshow: function (input) {\n\t\t\t\tthis.deferred = $q.defer();\n\t\t\t\tthis.active   = true;\n\t\t\t\tthis.value    = $scope.hobbies.length;\n\t\t\t\tthis.label    = input;\n\t\t\t\treturn this.deferred.promise;\n\t\t\t},\n\t\t\tinsert: function () {\n\t\t\t\tthis.active = false;\n\t\t\t\tthis.deferred.resolve({\n\t\t\t\t\tvalue: this.value,\n\t\t\t\t\tlabel: this.label\n\t\t\t\t});\n\t\t\t},\n\t\t\tcancel: function () {\n\t\t\t\tthis.active = false;\n\t\t\t\tthis.deferred.reject();\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t};\n\t}]);"/>\n        </form>\n       </li>\n      </ul>\n      <h4 class="ng-binding" ng-bind-html="example.title|trustAsHtml">\n       Create custom options (using\n       <code>\n        Promise\n       </code>\n       )\n      </h4>\n     </div>\n     <!-- ngIf: example.service -->\n     <!-- ngIf: !example.service -->\n     <div class="tab-content ng-scope" ng-if="!example.service">\n      <div class="tab-pane example active" ng-class="{active:tab==\'view\'}">\n       <div class="ng-scope" ng-show="!creation.active">\n        <div class="selector-container ng-isolate-scope multiple remove-button" create="creation.show(input)" dir="ltr" model="myHobbies" multi="true" ng-attr-dir="{{rtl ? \'rtl\' : \'ltr\'}}" ng-class="{open: isOpen, empty: !filteredOptions.length &amp;&amp;
